remark.en: Course level: basic.Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade.The lecturer reserves the right to withdraw students absent for the first 2 classes.
remark.ch: 限華語程度為初級之外籍生。一、第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績。二、前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。

goal.en: 本課程是為上學期學過36小時聽說華語課程的學生所設計的，旨在培養和積累現代標準華語的基本交際能力。在課程中，學生將發展其聽、說、讀和寫（打）四方面的技能。然而，本課程的重點將是培養學生的口語和聽力技巧的交際能力。以口語和聽力帶動閱讀和寫作。學生將能夠在特定情況下用華語進行口頭交流。
goal.ch: This course is designed for the students, who have had studied Mandarin Chinese for 36 hours in the prior semester, to develop and accumulate the basic communication skills in the Modern Standard Chinese. Throughout the course, students will develop their listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. However, the emphasis in this course will be on building up students’ communicative competence in oral and aural skills. Reading and writing will be minimally introduced along with speaking and listening skills. Students will be able to communicate verbally in Chinese language within given situations.

content.en:
1. Students will be able to simply introduce family members and titles. comment the result of an action as well as to simply describe personal or others’ hobbies.
2. Students will be able to simply use numbers great than or equal to 100 for daily convenient shopping.
3. Students will be able to simply express individual preferences and abilities.
4. Students will be able to simply express places, locations and movements.
content.ch:
1. 學生將能夠簡單介紹家庭及使用對家人的稱呼。
2. 學生將能夠學會在日常生活購物中使用百以上的大數字。
3. 學生將能夠簡單表達個人喜好和能力。
4. 學生將能夠簡單表達地點、位置和行為動作。
